title: New Zyra skin ever ?
body: As a Zyra main i feel after the rework she has just been pushed to the back again and will never get a new skin, Riot needs to start making skins for champs that have been out for a while instead of punching out all these new skins for the new champs. Last Zyra skin was the SKT skin and that was 2 years ago...... makes me quite sad :(

replies.body: ...... hence why i said they should start making skins for champs that have been out for a while..... can you guys read? or mentally stupid? :)

Get in line behind Swain, Karthus, Yorick, Urgot, Evelynn, Poppy, Cassiopeia. and everyone else that Riot forgot.

Some of those champs haven't had skins for 4 or 5 years (and Yorick has NEVER got a new skin)

Zyra needs some new skins its true, but Karthus doesn't have a single skin that changes any particle effects _(let that sink in, a mage who's entire kit revolves around swirling magic around himself and throwing out everywhere, doesnt have a single skin that changes his particle effects. But Olaf, who does nothing except throwing an axe, does have skins that change his effects)_ Swain hasn't got a skin for 4+ years. Yorick has never got a skin and unlike Gangplank who has lots of skins, he didnt even get one with his update.

Zyra has 3 skins, 2 of which change her particles, and both of which are very very good skins.
She is LOW on the priority list here I'm afraid.
At least she has 3 fairly good skin, unlike some champions that have 1-2 skins bad skins.
